data.message: I'll like it more when you stop showing me pages or people you think I want to know, and stop showing me sponsored ads that take up half my page.

replies.message: AdBlock extension
yeah ur right

If you don't want that to happen then excuse yourself from the entire internet because people watch your internet history and sell it to companies so they can advertise things that you may want. It's everywhere.
I can't understand people like you... AdBlock is working on Facebook. Why don't you use it ?
#AdBlock thanks guys
it cant be done bro, more ads means huge money.
Amen!
AdBlock + FB Purity = for those who like to fix their "clientside" facebook. Nothing wrong in using those browser extensions. ;)
On the left hand side, there is NEWSFEED, change to RECENT STORIES, instead of TOP STORIES.
i agree!! how does fb know what we like? they don't!!

I do not like missing out on my friends' posts because of your algorithm.  Trust me to make my own decision as to what shows up on my newsfeed using a slider where 0 = show me none to 10 = show me all.  Same for friends as for page posts.

LinkedIn is far more creepier place than FB in means of "former connections to other people". You might have been talking to someone in FB like years ago, forgot that and *boom*, LinkedIn reminds you that you've said "hi" to this person before. O.o
The ads should NOT take up half the page, not to mention all the app suggestions!
i hate my new newsfeed
I hate it too and i upload a music video and audio they erase it auotamaticly .i download not a child ponography or porn movies.
Use AdBlock+. It works beautifully for me, and I don't get bothered with ads. Ever.
use adblock,its simple to use
I also agree yoh, too much adverts,u  end up not seeing your friend's posts
And slapping my hand when I friend people you thought I might know !
FB can do whatever the hell it likes. People act like having access to facebook is a human right. Hardly!
A-men
For sure.
Can't complain too much.. It is a free site. :P
exactly, I don't like that!
Agree! I'm tired of being TOLD which pages to LIKE as well! HATE THIS NEW FB LOOK! #BringBackTheOtherPlease
